mapper.select: select pid,date(commitDate) as commitDate, sum(addLines) as addLines, sum(deleteLines) as deleteLines, sum(changeLines) as changeLines, count(pid) as total_commits from test1.commitevent where project=#{project} group by commitDate,pid;
mapper.update: update test1.student inner join ( select test1.commitevent.pid, sum(test1.commitevent.addLines) addLines, sum(test1.commitevent.deleteLines) deleteLines, sum(test1.commitevent.changeLines) changeLines, count(pid) times from test1.commitevent group by commitevent.pid ) t on t.pid=student.id set totalAddLines=t.addLines,totalDeleteLines=t.deleteLines, totalChangeLines=t.changeLines,totalCommits=t.times where student.id=t.pid
